Социальная сеть для каждого: поддержка п: A social network for everyone: user support, cozy communication <nobr>and convenient</nobr> service.
Fast loading even with a weak network.
The social platform will appeal to everyone.
Большое количество разных интересных люд: A large number of different interesting people.

Меняйте свой профиль, используя различны: Change your profile by using different pictures <nobr>and design elements</nobr> to create a visual representation <nobr>of yourself</nobr>.
Аквариум удобно работает <nobr>в вебе</n: Aquarium works comfortably <nobr>on the web</nobr> <nobr>and on</nobr> mobile devices, delivering only positive emotions.
В соцсети зарегистрировано более 50-ти ч: There are more than 50 people registered in the social network. And every day there are more and more people.
Социальная сеть Аквариум — это место, гд: The Aquarium social network is a place where you can create your own world that reflects your personality, interests and uniqueness.
Аквариум предлагает тематику подводного: The aquarium offers an underwater world theme. This creates a special atmosphere and allows people with common interests to unite around one idea
Меняйте свою страницу, используя различн: Customize your page with different avatars, hats, and design elements to create a visual representation of yourself and your interests
Вы можете делиться своими приключениями,: You can share your adventures, post photos, videos and write posts about what's important to you.
Целевая аудитория социальной сети: подро: Target audience of the social network: teenagers and youth, boys and girls from <nobr>13</nobr> years old and men and girls up to 42 years old. There will be no restrictions on the use of the social network for other ages, except for children under 13.
Детям до 13-ти лет нужно получить соглас: Children under the age of 13 need to obtain parental consent to process personal data. You can fill in the form at the link:
Форма для детей до 13-ти лет: Uniforms for children up to 13 years old
Большинство пользователей, которые рады: Most users who are happy to run their social networks
Те, кто стремится к объединению обществе: Those who seek to bring community efforts together, discuss problems and find partners
Аквариум приветствует всех, кто вдохновл: The Aquarium welcomes all who are inspired by the beauty of the world, love photographing amazing creatures, and want to share that beauty with others
Аквариум предлагает возможность творческ: The Aquarium offers an opportunity for creative fulfillment for photographers, artists and anyone who has been looking for a place to express their inspiration and creativity in the context of marine life and surroundings
Те, кто ценит пейзажи и мечтает делиться: Those who appreciate scenery and dream of sharing fascinating stories and experiences of their underwater adventures with a wide audience.
Социальная сеть Аквариум располагается п: The Aquarium Social Network is located at:
С этого адреса доступна сама социальная: From this address, the social network itself is accessible, media feeds are maintained and developer access is located.
Основной интерфейс взаимодействия с соци: The main interface for interacting with the social network is the website, which is how you can create a new account or log in to an existing one, customize and personalize your data, find new people and manage your page.
Для доступа к социальной сети на мобильн: To access the social network on mobile devices, it is better to use
которые доступны для Android и iOS. У по: which are available for Android and iOS. Users with mobile devices retain access to the web version of the Aquarium social network.
Для взаимодействия с социальной сетью Ак: To interact with the Aquarium social network, developers can use the Aquarium social network API to access their own account and basic social network features. To do this, use
Сайт соцсети Аквариум работает на PHP 8,: The Aquarium social network site runs on PHP 8, using the Laravel 10 framework. Bootstrap 5 framework is used for the interface. Read more about the project technologies at
Открытый протокол авторизации при помощи: Open authorization protocol using the Aquarium social network. With the help of OAuth users have the ability to log in to accounts of other services using their Aquarium social network account. When authorizing, the user has the ability to specify what data can be shared.
При регистрации пользователь использует: When registering, the user uses e-mail to secure access to the account and the possibility of restoring access to the account. When authorizing, the user indicates the entered e-mail and his/her own password, or uses the code sent to the specified e-mail.
При регистрации или изменении пароля, он: When you register or change your password, it is stored in encrypted form using Bcrypt hashing with no possibility of decryption. In case of unauthorized access, it is impossible to get the password from the account.
Проект социальной сети Аквариум представ: The Aquarium Social Network Project is an open source project hosted on GitHub:
Каждый желающий может участвовать в разв: Everyone can participate in the development of the project, make changes, develop additions and suggest improvements. Access to
Для того, чтобы получить доступ к личном: In order to get access to the personal account, a user needs to log in to his/her account or create a new one. To create an account, you can use 2 methods of authorization: via mail and using services.
При регистрации аккаунта через почту, по: When registering an account via mail, the user will be required to confirm the mail via a code sent to the mail. Registering via mail is convenient because the user clearly knows which mail is used when registering.
Использование сервисов не требует подтве: Using services does not require email confirmation. Using services is the fastest way to register an account because it requires pressing 1 button.
У пользователей есть возможность добавит: Users have the option to add a second account and conveniently switch between them in one click.
Выход из аккаунта не удаляет сам аккаунт: Logging out of an account does not delete the account or account data; logging out of an account releases the account authorization record. After logging out of an account, you will need to re-authorize to the account. Logging out of an account on one device does not log out of an account on another device.
Для изменения аватарки или шапки аккаунт: To change the avatar or account header, you should use the settings, customization tab.
У пользователей есть возможность настрои: Users have the option to customize account notifications, to enable only the notifications required for the account. You can customize notifications through settings, item Notifications.
Для изменения пароля следует использоват: To change the password, use the settings, item change password. If you have forgotten your password, you will need to confirm your email ownership or use your old account password.
Изменение личный данных аккаунта доступн: Changing the personal data of the account is available through the settings in the personal data tab. The user's first name, last name and username are available for changing. It is possible to find the user's account by username.
Подтверждение почты в аккаунте соцсети А: Email confirmation in an Aquarium social network account provides an increased level of security and helps maintain a more trustworthy and transparent user community. Email confirmation helps verify a user's identity and protects the account from unauthorized access or the creation of fake profiles.
Подтвержденная электронная почта делает: A verified email makes the account recovery process more efficient and easier in case you lose access to your account.
У любого пользователя есть возможность н: Any user has the opportunity to permanently delete an account from the social network Aquarium. To do this, fill out the account deletion form in the settings and confirm the account.
Все принципы любых коммуникаций Аквариум: All principles of any Aquarium communications, Aquarium logo and design system.
Как пришла идея: How did you come up with the idea
В 2019 году при разработке мобильных игр: In 2019, the task of saving progress between different devices appeared in mobile game development. This required developing a personal account, implementing the ability to authorize, saving game progress to the server and reading this progress from other devices in order to have a "seamless" game between different devices.
Удалось реализовать личный кабинет через: We managed to implement the personal account through the mobile game, but the task appeared - it was necessary to implement access to the account through the browser for convenient account settings. To solve this problem, the development of a web version of the personal account was started in 2019.
В 2019 году появился первый проект, в ко: In 2019, the first project appeared, in which there was an "attempt" to implement a personal account. Unfortunately, this site was not a success: it did not allow you to create an account or log in to an existing one.
В 2020-2022 годах была более успешная по: In 2020-2022, there was a more successful attempt to develop a personal account in pure PHP. The project was called "Creagoo ID" and was located at the following address
сейчас по этому адресу открывается текущ: now the current social network opens at this address. The development came out better, users had the ability to log into accounts and create new ones, there was basic account customization.
В 2023 году произошел перезапуск проекта: In 2023 there was a relaunch of the 2020-2022 project, the implementation was on the same pure PHP, but there was integration with OAuth of other services, sending emails and notifications, integration with other users and "starting" posts. This project exists already as a "social network".
«Аквариум» — это символ виртуального под: "Aquarium" is a symbol of a virtual underwater world where users can socialize, share their moments and observations, and be part of an amazing zone of exchange of ideas and emotions. The name "Aquarium" embodies the freshness, transparency and diversity that characterize our social network.
Разработка мобильного приложения для Акв: Development of a mobile application for the Aquarium. Mobile applications for Android and iOS are planned to be created using React Native framework. The development is planned to take at least 9 months
Добавление фотографий. Фотографии в соци: Adding photos. Photos in the social network can be used in the personal profile, in the profile header, in posts
Увеличение аудитории до 100 человек. Пос: Increasing the audience to 100 people. Constant audience growth is an incentive to continue working on the social network
Реализация OAuth для интеграции с другим: OAuth implementation for integration with other services
Реализация API для доступа к личному каб: Implementation of API for access to the personal account.
Акция «Пригласи друга» — это возможность: The "Invite a Friend" promotion — is an opportunity to send a personal invitation to a friend to participate for more people to invite. Don't forget to tell your friend that they can participate too!
Чтобы использовать личное приглашение, с: To use a personal invitation, you should copy it from your profile.
Разработка социальной сети Аквариум отра: The development of the Aquarium social network reflects an exciting and creative process that contributes to an attractive online platform. Different people are involved in this work, to each of whom we would like to express our personal gratitude:
Анастасия Пара – художник, автор стикеро: Anastasia Para is an artist, author of stickers,
Роман Казин – художник, автор шапок,: Roman Kazin is an artist, author of hats,
Дарья Уткина – художник, помощь в консул: Daria Utkina is an artist, assisting in UI consultation,
Одной из главных целей OAuth является об: One of the main goals of OAuth is to provide security, simplify the authorization process, and facilitate the secure exchange of data between users and online resources.
С помощью этой технологии пользователи м: With this technology, users can conveniently log in to other services, control access to their personal information, and rest assured that their data will only be shared according to their own settings and permissions.
OAuth играет важную роль в создании боле: OAuth plays an important role in creating a stronger, more connected and secure online environment. With this technology, web applications can integrate, share data and provide advanced services while maintaining a high level of security and privacy.
Вам необходимо зарегистрироваться в пане: You need to register in the Aquarium Developer Panel by
Вы можете использовать аккаунт Аквариума: You can use an Aquarium account.
После регистрации аккаунта потребуется з: After registering an account, you will need to register the app by
После регистрации аккаунта и создания пр: After registering an account and creating an application, you will need to customize it. To set up the application, you need to specify the name of the application, add an avatar as desired, specify the data that will be required for authorization and specify the Redirect URI.
Для того, чтобы иметь возможность обрабо: In order to be able to process the received user data after successful authorization through Aquarium OAuth, it will be necessary to enter the path data in the application settings - Redirect URI. If you try to send a request to an unauthorized path, the request will be rejected. This protection works against unauthorized access.
ClientID — идентификатор приложения. Исп: ClientID - application identifier. It is used in requests to get OAuth token.
Client secret — секретный ключ, который: Client secret - the secret key that is used to sign requests.
Токен — единоразовый ключ для доступа к: A token is a one-time key to access user data.
После настройки приложения, следует отпр: After setting up the application, you should send it for moderation. After successful moderation, you will be able to use Aquarium OAuth for authorization through services. Otherwise, you will need to make changes to the application and resubmit for moderation.
Настоящая политика обработки персональны: This policy of personal data processing is drawn up in accordance with the requirements of the Federal Law dated 27.07.2006. No. 152-FZ "On Personal Data" (hereinafter - the Personal Data Law) and defines the procedure for processing personal data and measures to ensure the security of personal data, undertaken by Aquarium (hereinafter - the Operator).
Оператор ставит своей важнейшей целью и: The Operator sets as its most important goal and condition of its activity the observance of human and citizen's rights and freedoms during the processing of personal data, including the protection of the rights to privacy, personal and family secrecy.
Настоящая политика Оператора в отношении: This Operator's policy on personal data processing (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) applies to all information that the Operator may obtain about website visitors
Основные понятия, используемые в Политик: Basic concepts used in the Policy
Автоматизированная обработка персональны: Automated processing of personal data – processing of personal data with the help of computing equipment.
Блокирование персональных данных – време: Blocking of personal data – temporary cessation of personal data processing (except for cases when processing is necessary to clarify personal data).
Веб-сайт – совокупность графических и ин: Website – a set of graphic and informational materials, as well as computer programs and databases, ensuring their availability on the Internet at the network address
Информационная система персональных данн: Personal data information system – a set of personal data contained in databases and information technologies and technical means ensuring their processing.
Обезличивание персональных данных — дейс: Personal data depersonalization – actions, as a result of which it is impossible to determine without using additional information whether personal data belong to a particular User or other subject of personal data.
Обработка персональных данных – любое де: Processing of personal data – any action (operation) or set of actions (operations) performed with or without the use of automation means with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (update, change), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of personal data.
Оператор – государственный орган, муници: Operator – a state authority, municipal authority, legal or natural person, independently or jointly with other persons organizing and (or) carrying out processing of personal data, as well as determining the purposes of personal data processing, composition of personal data subject to processing, actions (operations) performed with personal data.
Персональные данные – любая информация,: Personal Data – any information relating directly or indirectly to a specific or identifiable User of the website
Персональные данные, разрешенные субъект: Personal data authorized by the subject of personal data for dissemination - personal data, access to which is provided by the subject of personal data to an unlimited number of persons by giving consent to the processing of personal data authorized by the subject of personal data for dissemination in the manner prescribed by the Law on Personal Data (hereinafter - personal data authorized for dissemination).
Пользователь – любой посетитель веб-сайт: User – any visitor to the website
Предоставление персональных данных – дей: Provision of personal data – actions aimed at disclosure of personal data to a certain person or a certain circle of persons.
Распространение персональных данных – лю: Dissemination of personal data - any actions aimed at disclosure of personal data to an indefinite number of persons (transfer of personal data) or familiarization of personal data to an unlimited number of persons, including disclosure of personal data in mass media, placement in information and telecommunication networks or providing access to personal data in any other way.
Трансграничная передача персональных дан: Cross-border transfer of personal data - transfer of personal data to the territory of a foreign country to a foreign government authority, a foreign individual or a foreign legal entity.
Уничтожение персональных данных – любые: Destruction of personal data - any actions, as a result of which personal data are irretrievably destroyed with the impossibility of further recovery of the content of personal data in the information system of personal data and (or) material carriers of personal data are destroyed.
Основные права и обязанности Оператора: Main rights and obligations of the Operator
Оператор имеет право:: The operator shall have the right to:
получать от субъекта персональных данных: to receive from the subject of personal data reliable information and/or documents containing personal data;
в случае отзыва субъектом персональных д: in case the personal data subject revokes his/her consent to personal data processing, the Operator has the right to continue personal data processing without the consent of the personal data subject if there are grounds specified in the Personal Data Law;
самостоятельно определять состав и переч: independently determine the composition and list of measures necessary and sufficient to ensure the fulfillment of obligations stipulated by the Law on personal data and regulatory legal acts adopted in accordance with it, unless otherwise provided by the Law on personal data or other federal laws.
предоставлять субъекту персональных данн: provide the personal data subject, upon his/her request, with information regarding the processing of his/her personal data;
организовывать обработку персональных да: organize the processing of personal data in accordance with the procedure established by the current legislation of the Russian Federation;
отвечать на обращения и запросы субъекто: respond to appeals and requests of personal data subjects and their legal representatives in accordance with the requirements of the Law on personal data;
сообщать в уполномоченный орган по защит: report to the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects, upon request of this body, the necessary information within 30 days from the date of receipt of such request;
публиковать или иным образом обеспечиват: publish or otherwise provide unrestricted access to this Personal Data Processing Policy;
принимать правовые, организационные и те: to take legal, organizational and technical measures to protect personal data from unlawful or accidental access to them, destruction, modification, blocking, copying, provision, dissemination of personal data, as well as from other unlawful actions in relation to personal data;
прекратить передачу (распространение, пр: cease transfer (dissemination, provision, access) of personal data, stop processing and destroy personal data in the manner and cases stipulated by the Personal Data Law;
исполнять иные обязанности, предусмотрен: fulfill other obligations stipulated by the Personal Data Law.
Основные права и обязанности субъектов п: Basic rights and obligations of personal data subjects
Субъекты персональных данных имеют право: Personal data subjects have the right to:
получать информацию, касающуюся обработк: receive information regarding the processing of his/her personal data, except in cases provided for by federal laws. Information shall be provided to the subject of personal data by the Operator in an accessible form and shall not contain personal data relating to other subjects of personal data, except in cases where there are legal grounds for disclosure of such personal data. The list of information and the procedure for obtaining it is established by the Law on Personal Data;
требовать от оператора уточнения его пер: to demand from the operator to clarify his personal data, block or destroy them in case the personal data are incomplete, outdated, inaccurate, illegally obtained or are not necessary for the stated purpose of processing, as well as to take measures provided for by law to protect his rights;
выдвигать условие предварительного согла: impose a condition of prior consent when processing personal data in order to market goods, works and services;
на отзыв согласия на обработку персональ: to withdraw consent to the processing of personal data;
обжаловать в уполномоченный орган по защ: to appeal to the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects or in court against unlawful acts or omissions of the Operator in the processing of his/her personal data;
на осуществление иных прав, предусмотрен: to exercise other rights provided for by the legislation of the Russian Federation.
Субъекты персональных данных обязаны:: Personal data subjects are obliged to:
предоставлять Оператору достоверные данн: Personal data subjects are obliged to:
сообщать Оператору об уточнении (обновле: to notify the Operator about clarification (update, change) of his/her personal data.
Лица, передавшие Оператору недостоверные: Persons who have passed to the Operator false information about themselves or information about another subject of personal data without the consent of the latter shall be held liable in accordance with the legislation of the Russian Federation.
Оператор может обрабатывать следующие пе: The Operator may process the following personal data of the User
Last name, first name, middle name.
Также на сайте происходит сбор и обработ: The site also collects and processes anonymized data about visitors (including cookies) using Internet statistics services (Yandex Metrics and Google Analytics and others).
Вышеперечисленные данные далее по тексту: The above-mentioned data are further on in the text of the Policy united by the general concept of Personal Data.
Обработка специальных категорий персонал: The Operator does not process special categories of personal data concerning race, nationality, political opinions, religious or philosophical beliefs, intimate life.
Обработка персональных данных, разрешенн: The processing of personal data authorized for dissemination, from among the special categories of personal data specified in Article 10, paragraph 1 of the Law on personal data, is allowed if the prohibitions and conditions provided for in Article 10.1 of the Law on personal data are complied with.
Согласие Пользователя на обработку персо: The User's consent to the processing of personal data authorized for dissemination is executed separately from other consents to the processing of his/her personal data. In this case, the conditions stipulated, in particular, by Article 10.1 of the Law on Personal Data are observed. The requirements for the content of such consent shall be established by the authorized body for the protection of the rights of personal data subjects.
Согласие на обработку персональных данны: Consent to the processing of personal data authorized for dissemination is provided by the User directly to the Operator.
Оператор обязан в срок не позднее трех р: The Operator is obliged to publish information about the conditions of processing, the existence of prohibitions and conditions for processing by an unlimited number of persons of personal data authorized for dissemination within three working days from the receipt of the said consent of the User.
Передача (распространение, предоставлени: The transfer (dissemination, provision, access) of personal data authorized by the subject of personal data for dissemination shall be stopped at any time at the request of the subject of personal data. This request shall include the surname, first name, patronymic (if any), contact information (telephone number, e-mail address or postal address) of the subject of personal data, as well as a list of personal data whose processing is subject to termination. The personal data specified in this request may be processed only by the Operator to whom it is sent.
Согласие на обработку персональных данны: Consent to the processing of personal data authorized for dissemination shall terminate upon receipt by the Operator of the request specified in clause 5.9.3 of this Personal Data Processing Policy.
Обработка персональных данных осуществля: The processing of personal data is carried out on a lawful and fair basis.
Обработка персональных данных ограничива: The processing of personal data is limited to the achievement of specific, predetermined and legitimate purposes. Processing of personal data incompatible with the purposes of personal data collection is not allowed.
Не допускается объединение баз данных, с: It is not allowed to merge databases containing personal data processed for incompatible purposes.
Обработке подлежат только персональные д: Only personal data that meet the purposes for which they are processed shall be processed.
Содержание и объем обрабатываемых персон: The content and scope of processed personal data correspond to the stated purposes of processing. Redundancy of processed personal data in relation to the stated purposes of their processing is not allowed.
При обработке персональных данных обеспе: When processing personal data, the accuracy of personal data, their sufficiency and, where necessary, relevance in relation to the purposes of personal data processing shall be ensured. The operator shall take the necessary measures and/or ensure that they are taken to delete or clarify incomplete or inaccurate data.
Хранение персональных данных осуществляе: Personal data shall be stored in a form that allows identification of the subject of personal data for no longer than required by the purposes of personal data processing, unless the period of personal data storage is established by federal law, contract to which the subject of personal data is a party, beneficiary or guarantor. Processed personal data shall be destroyed or depersonalized upon achievement of the purposes of processing or in case of loss of necessity to achieve these purposes, unless otherwise provided for by federal law.
Цель обработки персональных данных Польз: Purpose of processing the User's personal data:
информирование Пользователя посредством: informing the User by sending e-mails;
предоставление доступа Пользователю к се: providing the User with access to services, information and/or materials contained on the Web site
Также Оператор имеет право направлять По: The Operator also has the right to send the User notifications about new products and services, special offers and various events. The User can always opt out of receiving informational messages by sending the Operator a letter to the e-mail address
с пометкой «Отказ от уведомлений о новых: labeled "Opt-out of notifications of new products and services and special offers".
Обезличенные данные Пользователей, собир: The anonymized data of Users collected through Internet statistics services are used to collect information about Users' actions on the website, to improve the quality of the website and its content.
Правовые основания обработки персональны: Legal basis for personal data processing
Правовыми основаниями обработки персонал: The legal grounds for the processing of personal data by the Operator are:
Федеральный закон «Об информации, информ: Federal Law "On Information, Information Technologies and Information Protection" dated 27.07.2006 N 149-FZ;
федеральные законы, иные нормативно-прав: federal laws, other regulatory legal acts in the field of personal data protection;
согласия Пользователей на обработку их п: Users' consent to the processing of their personal data, to the processing of personal data authorized for dissemination.
Оператор обрабатывает персональные данны: The Operator processes the User's personal data only if it is filled in and/or sent by the User himself via special forms located on the website
или направленные Оператору посредством э: or sent to the Operator via e-mail. By filling in the relevant forms and/or sending their personal data to the Operator, the User expresses their consent to this Policy.
Оператор обрабатывает обезличенные данны: The Operator processes anonymized data about the User if it is allowed in the User's browser settings (cookies and JavaScript technology enabled).
Субъект персональных данных самостоятель: The subject of personal data independently decides on the provision of his/her personal data and gives consent freely, of his/her own free will and in his/her own interest.
Обработка персональных данных осуществля: Personal data processing is carried out with the consent of the personal data subject to the processing of his/her personal data.
Обработка персональных данных необходима: Processing of personal data is necessary to achieve the purposes stipulated by the international treaty of the Russian Federation or by law, to fulfill the functions, powers and duties assigned to the operator by the legislation of the Russian Federation.

Processing of personal data is necessary for the administration of justice, execution of a judicial act, act of another body or official subject to execution in accordance with the legislation of the Russian Federation on enforcement proceedings.

The processing of personal data is necessary for the execution of a contract to which the personal data subject is a party or a beneficiary or guarantor, as well as for the conclusion of a contract at the initiative of the personal data subject or a contract under which the personal data subject will be a beneficiary or guarantor.

The processing of personal data is necessary for the exercise of the rights and legitimate interests of the operator or third parties or for the achievement of socially important purposes, provided that the rights and freedoms of the personal data subject are not violated.
Осуществляется обработка персональных да: Processing of personal data to which an unlimited number of persons have access by the subject of personal data or at his/her request (hereinafter – publicly available personal data) is carried out.
Processing of personal data subject to publication or mandatory disclosure in accordance with federal law.
Порядок сбора, хранения, передачи и друг: Procedure for collection, storage, transfer and other types of personal data processing
Безопасность персональных данных, которы: The security of personal data processed by the Operator is ensured by implementing legal, organizational and technical measures necessary for full compliance with the requirements of the applicable legislation in the field of personal data protection.
Оператор обеспечивает сохранность персон: The Operator ensures the safety of personal data and takes all possible measures to prevent unauthorized persons from accessing personal data.
Персональные данные Пользователя никогда: The User's personal data will never, under no circumstances be transferred to third parties, except in cases related to the execution of the applicable law or if the subject of personal data has given consent to the Operator to transfer the data to a third party for the fulfillment of obligations under a civil law contract.
В случае выявления неточностей в персона: In case of inaccuracies in personal data, the User may update them independently by sending a notification to the Operator to the Operator's e-mail address.
Срок обработки персональных данных опред: The period of personal data processing is determined by the achievement of the purposes for which the personal data were collected, unless another period is stipulated by the contract or applicable law.
Пользователь может в любой момент отозва: The User may withdraw their consent to the processing of personal data at any time by sending a notice to the Operator by e-mail to the Operator's e-mail address
с пометкой «Отзыв согласия на обработку: labeled "Withdrawal of consent to the processing of personal data".
Вся информация, которая собирается сторо: All information that is collected by third-party services, including payment systems, means of communication and other service providers, is stored and processed by these persons (Operators) in accordance with their User Agreement and Privacy Policy. The subject of personal data and/or User is obliged to familiarize himself/herself with the said documents in a timely manner. The Operator is not responsible for the actions of third parties, including the service providers mentioned in this clause.
Установленные субъектом персональных дан: The prohibitions established by the personal data subject on the transfer (except for granting access), as well as on the processing or conditions of processing (except for obtaining access) of personal data authorized for dissemination shall not apply in cases of processing personal data in the state, public and other public interest as defined by the legislation of the Russian Federation.
Оператор при обработке персональных данн: When processing personal data, the Operator shall ensure confidentiality of personal data.
Оператор осуществляет хранение персональ: The Operator shall store personal data in a form that allows to identify the subject of personal data for no longer than required by the purposes of personal data processing, unless the period of personal data storage is established by federal law, contract to which the subject of personal data is a party, beneficiary or guarantor.
Условием прекращения обработки персональ: The condition for termination of personal data processing may be the achievement of the purposes of personal data processing, expiration of the personal data subject's consent or withdrawal of consent by the personal data subject, as well as detection of unlawful processing of personal data.
Перечень действий, производимых Оператор: List of actions performed by the Operator with the received personal data
Оператор осуществляет сбор, запись, сист: The Operator shall collect, record, systematize, accumulate, store, clarify (update, change), extract, use, transfer (disseminate, provide, access), depersonalize, block, delete and destroy personal data.
Оператор осуществляет автоматизированную: The Operator carries out automated processing of personal data with or without receiving and/or transmitting the received information via information and telecommunication networks.
Оператор до начала осуществления трансгр: Prior to the commencement of trans-border transfer of personal data, the operator is obliged to make sure that the foreign state, to the territory of which the transfer of personal data is supposed to be carried out, provides reliable protection of the rights of personal data subjects.
Трансграничная передача персональных дан: Trans-border transfer of personal data to the territories of foreign states that do not meet the above requirements may be carried out only if the personal data subject consents in writing to the trans-border transfer of his/her personal data and/or fulfillment of an agreement to which the personal data subject is a party.
Оператор и иные лица, получившие доступ: The operator and other persons who have access to personal data are obliged not to disclose to third parties and not to disseminate personal data without the consent of the subject of personal data, unless otherwise provided for by federal law.
Пользователь может получить любые разъяс: The User may obtain any clarifications on the issues of interest regarding the processing of his/her personal data by contacting the Operator via e-mail:
В данном документе будут отражены любые: This document will reflect any changes to the Operator's personal data processing policy. The Policy is valid indefinitely until it is replaced by a new version.
Актуальная версия Политики в свободном д: The current version of the Policy is freely available on the Internet at the following address:
Настоящий документ «Пользовательское сог: This "User Agreement" document constitutes an offer by Aquarium (hereinafter referred to as "Administration"), to enter into a contract on the terms and conditions of the Agreement set forth below.
Общие положения Пользовательского соглаш: General provisions of the User Agreement
В настоящем документе и вытекающих или с: The following terms and definitions shall apply herein and arising out of or relating to the relationship of the Parties:

ознакомились с условиями настоящего Согл: have read the terms and conditions of this Agreement in full before using the Service;

соглашение (в том числе любая из его час: Agreement (including any of its parts) may be changed by the Administration without any special notice. Использование функциональных возможносте: Use of the functional capabilities of the Service is allowed only after the User has registered and authorized on the Site in accordance with the procedure established by the Administration.
Технические, организационные и коммерчес: Technical, organizational and commercial conditions of the Service use, including its functionalities, are brought to the Users' attention by means of a separate posting on the Website or by notification of the Users.

Посещая сайт «Аквариум» в сети «Интернет: By visiting the Aquarium website on the Internet, you agree to this policy, including the fact that the Aquarium may use cookies and other data for their further processing by Google Analytics, Yandex.Metrika and other systems, as well as may transfer them to third parties to conduct research, perform work or provide services.
Файлы cookie – текстовые файлы небольшог: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (personal computer, laptop, tablet, cell phone, and the like) when you visit sites on the Internet.
Кроме того, при посещении сайта «Аквариу: In addition, when you visit the Aquarium website on the Internet, other data is automatically collected, including: device specifications, IP address, information about the browser and language used, date and time of access to the site, addresses of requested pages of the site and other similar information.
Какие виды файлов cookie используются?: What types of cookies are used?
В зависимости от используемых вами брауз: Depending on the browser and device you use, different sets of cookies are used, which include strictly necessary, performance, functional and analytical cookies.
Для чего могут использоваться файлы cook: What can cookies be used for?
При посещении вами сайта «Аквариум» в се: When you visit the Aquarium website on the Internet, cookies may be used to:
обеспечения функционирования и безопасно: ensuring the functioning and security of the site;
улучшения качества сайта;: improving the quality of the site;
регистрации в системе самообслуживания (: registration in the self-service system (personal cabinet);
предоставлении вам информации об «Аквари: providing you with information about Aquarium, its products and services;
усовершенствования продуктов и (или) усл: to improve products and (or) services and to develop new products and (or) services.
Иная собираемая информация может быть ис: Other information collected may be used to generate your "interest list" consisting of a random identifier, interest category and timestamp to show you Internet content and advertisements that match your interests.
Используемые вами браузер и (или) устрой: The browser and/or device you use may allow you to block, delete or otherwise restrict the use of cookies. But cookies are an important part of the Aquarium's Internet site, so blocking, deleting or restricting their use may result in you not having access to all of the site's features.
Чтобы узнать, как управлять файлами cook: To learn how to manage cookies with the browser or device you are using, you can use the instructions provided by the browser developer or device manufacturer.
Интерфейс API – универсальное средство в: The API is a universal means of interacting with the Aquarium social network.
Интерфейс API (Application Programming I: API (Application Programming Interface) is a set of functions, methods, protocols and tools provided by the Aquarium social network that allows developers to create their own applications, interact with Aquarium data and functionality, extend the capabilities of the social network and integrate it with other applications and services.
Зачем нужен интерфейс API?: Why do you need an API interface?
Интерфейс API предоставляет разработчика: The API provides developers with the ability to use Aquarium's functionality in their applications and services. It allows access to user profiles, publications, friends, messages and other data, as well as to perform various actions such as creating and editing records, managing contacts, sending notifications, etc. Using the API interface, developers can create applications integrated with Aquarium, extending the capabilities of the social network and providing a more flexible and personalized interaction for users.
Как используется интерфейс API?: How is the API interface used?
Регистрация и получение доступа к API: Registering and getting access to API
Перед использованием интерфейса API Аква: Before using the Aquarium API, a developer needs to register their application and obtain an API key or access token. This will ensure security and control access to user data.
После получения API-ключа или токена дос: After receiving an API key or access token, the developer must use it to authenticate and authorize his application. In this way, the application can access certain data and functions of the social network according to the user's permissions.
Разработчик может отправлять запросы к и: A developer can send requests to the Aquarium API using various data transfer methods such as HTTP requests (e.g., GET, POST, PUT, DELETE). Requests can be sent to retrieve data about users, their friends, records, messages, etc., and to perform certain actions such as creating, updating or deleting data.
Полученные ответы от интерфейса API Аква: The responses received from the Aquarium API can be represented in various data formats such as JSON or XML. The developer must process this data in his application to extract the necessary information and perform further operations.
Интерфейс API предоставляет возможности: The API provides options for adding, updating, and deleting data in Aquarium. Developers can create and edit user records, add media files, manage friends, and more.
Интерфейс API социальной сети Аквариум п: The Aquarium social network API provides developers with a powerful tool for creating applications, integrating the social network with other services and extending the platform's functionality. Using the API, developers can enhance user interaction with Aquarium by providing a more flexible and personalized experience. The API opens the door to innovation and development of the Aquarium social network, providing developers with a wide range of possibilities.
Технологии предназначенны для обеспечени: The technologies are designed to provide usability, increased functionality and scalability of the application.
Laravel, как современный и мощный фреймв: Laravel, as a modern and powerful framework, ensures the development of a functional and secure frontend and backend for a project. It is used for building a robust architecture and handling web requests.
Использование Laravel способствует повыш: Using Laravel helps to improve development efficiency and provides better project security.
Использование Bootstrap обеспечивает раз: Using Bootstrap provides development of flexible and adaptive frontend. Improving user content and visual design of the project, providing adaptability for different devices.
Использование протокола OAuth обеспечива: The use of the OAuth protocol provides fast and secure user logins. OAuth allows you to greatly simplify authorization to your own account by using accounts from other services.
Описания позиционирования, концепций Акв: Descriptions of Aquarium's positioning, concepts, logo and design system.
Может содержать только латинские буквы в: Can only contain lower case Latin letters.
